info.title: PlusMove Laravel API
info.description: API documentation for PlusMove which handles deliveries.

post.summary: Store a new address for a user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to store a new for the user

message.example: The address line 1 field is required.

items.example: The address line 1 field is required.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to view the addresses for this user.

404.description: Not Found - The user with the specified ID was not found.

post.summary: Store a new address for a customer
post.description: Store a new address for a customer

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to view this customer.

404.description: Not Found - The customer with the specified ID was not found.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the address to update

message.example: The address line 1 field is required.

items.example: The address line 1 field is required.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to update this address.

404.description: Not Found - The address with the specified ID was not found.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the address to delete

404.description: Not Found - The address with the specified ID was not found.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to delete this address.
Forbidden - The user does not have permission to view the customers.

message.example: The name field is required. (and 2 more errors)

items.example: The name field is required.
The phone field is required.
The email field is required.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to create a customer.

404.description: Not Found - The requested user was not found.

get.summary: Get a single customer by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to retrieve

404.description: Not Found - The customer with the specified ID was not found.

items.example: The name field is required.
The phone field is required.
The email field is required.

message.example: The user id field is required. (and 5 more errors)

items.example: The user id field is required.
The vehicle make field is required.
The vehicle model field is required.
The vehicle colour field is required.
The vehicle registration number field is required.
The driver license expires at field is required.

404.description: Not Found - The user with the specified ID was not found.

get.summary: Get a single user by ID

parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve

parameters.description: ID of the user to update

message.example: The first name field is required. (and 4 more errors)

items.example: The first name field is required.
The last name field is required.
The phone number field is required.
The email field is required.
The role id field is required.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to update this user.
